DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy Phenoptin™ ( sapropterin dihydrochloride ) reduce blood phenylalanine ( Phe ) level subject phenylketonuria .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Phenoptin™ Subjects With Phenylketonuria Who Have Elevated Phenylalanine Levels
